message: I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product worth $1250000! This is a rare chance to invest in something truly valuable. While I can't disclose the quality of the product, I assure you that it's a worthwhile investment. Consider the potential return on your investment and seize this opportunity!  The price is $1000000, a steal for the value it offers.
